unnormalised: Oye hoye! Seems like Diwali dhamaka came early, but not the kind we wanted. Your monthly cooking gas bill is about to feel the pinch, folks.
normalised: Oye hoye! Seems like Diwali dhamaka came early, but not the kind we wanted. Your monthly cooking gas bill is about to feel the pinch, folks.

unnormalised: Rs. 50 hike per cylinder announced yesterday by Indian Oil, Bharat Petroleum, and HPCL. Yup, domestic LPG cylinders are now costing you more.
normalised: Rupees fifty hike per cylinder announced yesterday by Indian Oil, Bharat Petroleum, and H P C L. Yup, domestic L P G cylinders are now costing you more.

unnormalised: "This is ridiculous, just before Diwali!" exclaimed Mrs. Sharma from Chembur, a sentiment echoed across the nation.
normalised: "This is ridiculous, just before Diwali!" exclaimed Missus Sharma from Chembur, a sentiment echoed across the nation.

unnormalised: Experts at the Indian Institute of Petroleum (IIP) cite rising global energy costs as the culprit. Dr. Verma from IIP said, "Crude oil prices impacting LPG production costs, leading to the price increase."
normalised: Experts at the Indian Institute of Petroleum (I I P) cite rising global energy costs as the culprit. Doctor Verma from I I P said, "Crude oil prices impacting L P G production costs, leading to the price increase."

unnormalised: Consumers are now looking for ways to cut back. "Gonna have to lay off the aloo parathas for a bit," jokes Raj from Bangalore, adding, "Maybe more poha?"
normalised: Consumers are now looking for ways to cut back. "Gonna have to lay off the aloo parathas for a bit," jokes Raj from Bangalore, adding, "Maybe more poha?"

unnormalised: This rise comes after months of relatively stable prices. Many families in smaller cities are already feeling the heat, especially those in rented 1BHK apartments of around 500 sq ft.
normalised: This rise comes after months of relatively stable prices. Many families in smaller cities are already feeling the heat, especially those in rented one B H K apartments of around five hundred square feet.

unnormalised: Let's hope this is just a temporary blip and not a permanent part of our Diwali budget! Stay tuned for more updates.
normalised: Let's hope this is just a temporary blip and not a permanent part of our Diwali budget! Stay tuned for more updates.
